content.text: I'm waiting tables at a cafe while I blog about my salt water aquarium ownership.  Do you like to cook?

I love to cook!  I love trying new recipes and finding new ways to use fresh ingredients.  I'm going to be starting a new juicing bar soon, so I'm learning everything I can about juicing and nutrition.
That's awesome!  I'm always looking for new recipes, so if you have any you'd like to share, I'd love to try them!  Have you ever tried cooking with seafood?
Yes, I love seafood!  I've made a lot of different seafood dishes, but one of my favorites is a simple shrimp scampi.  It's so easy to make and it's always delicious.
Oh my gosh, I love shrimp scampi!  I have to try that recipe.  Do you have any tips for making the best shrimp scampi?

Sure!  The most important thing is to use fresh shrimp.  You can also use frozen shrimp, but it won't be as good.  Another tip is to make sure you cook the shrimp until they're pink and opaque.  If you overcook them, they'll get tough.
Thanks for the tips!  I'm definitely going to try making shrimp scampi soon.
You're welcome!  I hope you like it!
